definition: happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to behave oneself/to abide by the rules
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
